author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
This PR is a general update of the HLT menu validation to Phase1.
It includes:
- update of the HLT menus to Phase1 (ie. confDB /dev/CMSSW_9_0_1/)
- clean up of PIon and HIon menus, as accorded with HI people
- clean up of modifyHLTforEras 
- add of GRun2016 to test the 2016 menu. Currently it is the /dev/CMSSW_9_0_0/ menu. It will become GRun + reverse customization function, as soon as the function will be ready
- update of the symbolic update to use the 'phase1_2017_realistic'
- update of the input files/eras to run the phase1 menu
- add 'HLT:@relval2017' cmsDriver option to peak the 2017 HLT menu

Open issues:
- we are waiting for the reverse customization function to get a 2016-like menu from the current menu
- we need to update relval to use HLT:@relval2017 instead of HLT:@relval2016.
- we need to update the IB tests to test also GRun2016
- one of the test will fail, because of a issue with EcalAlCaRecoProducers. It is caused by this line https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_9_1_X/Calibration/EcalAlCaRecoProducers/plugins/SelectedElectronFEDListProducer.cc#L309 . I strongly suspect that this code is not yet compatible with the Phase-1 pixels. I contacted HLT AlCa ( @trtomei ).
CC: @mtosi
title: Update HLT validation to Phase1 (91X)
